precondition: The Windows XP desktop is visible with a solid blue background.
action: Left Click on the desktop, in an empty area with no icons or open windows.
expected_results: No immediate changes will be visible.

precondition: The Windows XP desktop is visible.
The mouse cursor is visible on the screen.
expected_results: The mouse cursor will move to the right side of the screen.

precondition: The "Start" menu is open and the "Control Panel" option is highlighted.
expected_results: The "Start" menu will close and the Control Panel window will open.

precondition: The Control Panel is open in Category View. The left panel with the label 'Switch to Classic View' is visible.
action: Click the 'Switch to Classic View' link in the left panel.
expected_results: The Control Panel will switch to Classic View.

precondition: The 'Switch to Category View' option is visible in the left-hand navigation pane of the Windows XP Control Panel.
The "Wireless Network Setup Wizard" icon is selected in the Windows XP Control Panel.
expected_results: The keyboard focus will move to the icon immediately to the right of the "Wireless Network Setup Wizard" icon.

precondition: The "Add or Remove Programs" icon in the Control Panel window is highlighted.
expected_results: The focus will move from the "Add or Remove Programs" icon to the "Wireless Network Setup Wizard" icon.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open.
expected_results: The "Turn off monitor" and "Turn off hard disks" settings will change from "After 20 mins" to "Never".

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open.
action: Click the dropdown arrow next to "Turn off hard disks".
expected_results: A dropdown menu with a list of time interval options will appear.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open. The "System hibernates:" dropdown menu is open.
action: Click "Never" in the "System hibernates:" dropdown menu.
expected_results: The "System hibernates:" setting will be set to "Never".

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open. The "OK" button is visible at the bottom of the window.
expected_results: The "Power Options Properties" window will close.

precondition: The "Control Panel" window is open and the "Display" icon is visible.
The "Display Properties" window is open. The "Screen Saver" tab is active.
expected_results: The "Screen Saver" settings will be displayed.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Screen Saver" tab is active. The "Screen saver" dropdown menu currently displays "Windows XP".
action: Click the dropdown arrow on the "Screen saver" dropdown menu.
expected_results: A list of available screensavers will appear.

precondition: The list of available screensavers is visible in the "Screen saver" dropdown menu.
action: Click the "None" option in the list.
expected_results: The "Screen saver" dropdown menu will now display "None" as the selected screensaver.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Screen Saver" tab is active. The "Screen saver" dropdown menu should be open and displaying a list of screensaver options.
action: Click "3D FlowerBox" in the "Screen saver" dropdown menu.
expected_results: The selected screensaver will change to "3D FlowerBox".

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open with the "Screen Saver" tab selected.

action: Click the minimize button in the top-right corner of the 'Control Panel' window.
expected_results: The 'Control Panel' window will be minimized to the taskbar.
